title: [Large-Scale] Practical Language Learning Design for Leadership Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and work experience as an administrator
context.additional_context: Language leadership education course conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, operating with summative assessments and emphasizing collaborative learning experiences applicable in real-world contexts

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use ten situational communication expressions required in workplace settings
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans by applying language learning design principles
Learners can collaborate with peer leaders to develop and execute language-based leadership scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
